title: Dave Richard talks NFL Preseason Week 3 Fantasy Football draft prep (Football 08/24)
description:
Will Brinson breaks down the Week 3 game between the Browns and the Eagles before being joined by CBS Sports Dave Richard, who goes through every single game on the preseason schedule with Will to figure out what to look for and what to expect if you're doing your fantasy football draft this weekend or in the coming week. Where should you draft Saquon Barkley? Buying or selling Deshaun Watson? How do you handle Ronald Jones? Is Andrew Luck going to be ready and where should you draft T.Y. Hilton? Are you comfortable with Tyreek Hill as a No. 1 wide receiver? Who is a viable starter from the Jaguars? All those questions answered plus much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
